attributes.action: Make it an offense to advertise a dance festival and then headline it with RNB singers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kanye West will headline this year's Global Gathering DANCE MUSIC festival.

The US rapper will be joined by Moby and Mark Ronson at the two-day event in Stratford-Upon-Avon, which takes place on July 25-26.

Kanye West is not a dance act. When I pay out my cash for something I dont want to be given something entirely different. If I paid a car garage for a Red Ford and they gave me a blue Renault I would be gutted. Same here. If I want to listen to hip hop/RNB/pop I will go to that kind of festival. I dont expect Global to say, "hey, come to our dance event" then slap a hip hop artist as the headliner.

It is unfair that the company behind Godskitchen Global Gathering can lie and get away with it. Tighter guidelines should be adopted in law.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
